answerText: pulse oximetry [prompt on "oximetry"][10] Pulse ox readings are higher for these oxygen-rich blood vessels since they carry blood from the heart and lungs to the body. The pulmonary one is an exception, since it's deoxygenated.
heading: PADAWAN |2014 | 15 | 4 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Methemo-glob-inemia causes characteristic mid-80s readings in this technique. [10] Name this technique in which a sensor is placed on a fingertip or earlobe, enabling one to measure the amount of bound hemoglobin.
